summary:
Updated to v.II
This mod aim to give the player a Unique Evil Tower to call home via a Fully Voiced Quest.
The mod is extremely details and complexe... Many Armors, Outfits, Items & Artifacts, A large home with hidden secrets await ! Look at the mod description for more details !

[center][b][size=3]Warning[/size][/b][/center]
[center]First, i'd like to tell you all that this mod was design with my own taste,It contains NUDITY, TORTURE and some textures can reffer to SATANISM... You are warned ! If there's something you don't like in the mod, Don't Trash it, just delete it from your mod list !
Feel free to make video's of the mod, just let me know, so i can upload them here and credit you.
Feel free to upload your pictures as well, i like them all they are very well showing the atmosphere of the tower... Thank you guys !

[b][size=3]The Mod[/size][/b]
Hey Guys, It's finally here, the v.II (full) is up to grab !
The Dark Tower reffers as "RDT" for short,(a sequel to my mod for Oblivion) Is offering the player a Fully Voiced QUEST to get ownership of the tower.
I've spent the last year (since CK was released) working on this mod beside all of the real life stuff and familly. I'm proud to present what i hope will get a large interest & appreciation.
Many things have been improved / fix in v.II, Just get the mod & enjoy ! (see the "change log" for details at the bottom of the mod page).

The Mod aims to provide the player with a Unique Evil Tower, design to suit any type of caracter, the Evil, Dark & Corrupt Character will mostly like this "Home"...
I've spent countless hours cluttering every corner of the mod, so everywhere you look there's something, there's details, there's a "feeling".
The mod files is Huge, because of all the retextures...

The Mod has several Rooms... And includes Many *New Features*, In this mod you cannot cheat, The mod was not design for this. If you are looking for this type of mod, there's a few exellent mod outthere that doe's it ! Insted, you will find friendly features that blends perfectly with the spirits of Skyrim...

To gain access to the tower,
[spoiler]Go to Falkreath Inn, the Dead Man's Drink. There, look for an old man in black robe... Talk to him ![/spoiler] Once you gain access to the tower with the quest, remember that from any room in the Tower you can fast travel where you want ! The Tower, as a Map Marker once you complte the quest and discover the "marker". Also note that the Lighting settings in the mod are based on MY own game settings, and might not be exactly the same for you.

Here's How the mod is design.[/center]




[b][size=3]Main Hall:[/size][/b]
A large hall with a throne, that's where you have access most of the other rooms.
Features.
- A Throne where you can Sit with a Jarl animation and Enjoy the view of your Hall
- A Blood Fountain can be used to once a day filled an "Empty Blood Bottle" that can be found in a desk in the bedroom. The Filled Blood Bottle will restore your health 100%.
- Access to most other Rooms of the Tower.
- A Bard that you can request "Dragonborn Comes" & "Ragnar the Red"
- 4 display case to display your weapons.


[b][size=3]Pool Room:[/size][/b]
A pool room where you can swim and have a drink at the bar.
Features:
- A "Gym" to workout your stamina (can only be used ONCE a day to permanently incease your stamina by 5 pts)
- A Pool to swim in and a diving board.
- A Bar where you can ask the barmaid NPC for drinks & food.
- A "Playmate" that walk around half naked and enjoy swimming in the pool.(no new interaction)
- A Second "Playmate" that just wander around the bar.(no new interaction)

[b][size=3]Garden:[/size][/b]
A huge interior garden with a huge variety of plants from all over Skyrim.
Features:
- Multiplirium Chest that will multiply by 2 any ingredient you place inside, for a maximum of 3 days multiplying, OR for a maximum of 8 ingredient of the same kind. Exemple1, you put 3 garlic inside, 24h after you have 6, 48 hours after you have 8 (the maximum of 8 is reached)... Exemple2, you put 1 garlic inside, 24h after you have 2, 48 hours after you have 4, 72h after you have 8 (here, both the 3 days multiplying and ingredient maximum is reached)...
- An Alchemy Station (Cauldron) to allow alchemy experiment.
- An "Archeologycal" Dragon Skeleton.
- Many plants / ingredients including a special one...
- Small area to sit and read.

[b][size=3]Laboratory:[/size][/b]
A room where you can let your evil free and experiment anything on anyone...
Features:
- Alchemy Station.
- Enchanting Station.
- Soul Gems Converter chest, that chest will change any number of Grand Soul Gems placed inside into Black Soul Gems by casting "Soul Trap Spell" on the chest. There's a book on the ground, next to the chest that explain how it work and one that teach the Soultrap spell on the shelf.
- Torture Coffin, You can order your prisonner to get in the coffin via dialogue, closed the door of the coffin and and activate Darts or Flammes to torture him. Once your done, open the coffin door and order him to go back to the cage (he cannot die from torture).
- A Maid / Servant you can order (via dialogue) to make potions, or give you some foods.
- Altar of Minions, can be used to create a spell that will summon 2 Dark Shade Minions that will follow you permanetly untill they die.(Then the spell need to be Re-Created at the altar). There's a book on the altar that explain what you need to be able to create the minion spell.
- An other prisonner that's shackled 24/7 She cannot die. (no new interaction).
- 3 Dragon's Egg Ingredients (unique effect).
- Cooking Pot.

[b][size=3]Office:[/size][/b]
A large library and a workdesk to store all your precious book or sorcery and magic scrolls.
Features:
- Arcanum of Souls, An Evil book that can upgrade by 5 points any skills,(you can upgrade your skills as many times as you want) all you need is some dragon souls !
- A Book that teach a Summon "Shade Warrior" A custom Spell (you need the Necromancy perk to be able to cast it, the summon is powerful).
- A huge workdesk to sit and work on your future expeditions. The desk as some Scribe supplie that will respawn (but don't worry, it's clearly indicated as "respawnable".
- An eye candy Area that look like "pigeons messenger station" (no new interaction).
- 2 display case to display your weapons.

[b][size=3]Forge:[/size][/b]
A forge with a blacksmith, who is also a merchant with alot more gold then the usual merchants in Skyrim.
Features:
- A Stable area where you can find your Horse waitting for you (Mount it and fast travel).
- 2 Rottweiler Dog follower, if you talk to Saberwolf (the leader), he will start following you everywhere, the other dog just follow him, But Both Dogs will fight for you. You can also send them back home and "re-hired" them later.
- Forge Master Merchant with lots of gold.
- Forge.
- Tanning Rack.
- Workbench.
- Smelter.
- Spinning Weel.
- A few dummy to try on your new weapons. (no skill increase here)

[b][size=3]Master Bedroom:[/size][/b]
A Large Bedroom where you can sleep or relax in a jacuzzi...
Features:
- A Huttub (Jaccuzi) that will cure your diseases and regenerate you, when you sit in it (just activate one of the 3 invisible chair). When you are in the bedroom with a follower, you can now ask him to relax in the Huttub, he will then go and sit in it (and also remove all his equipped armor/clothes). The player will also get "naked" if you sit in it. (to get your follower out of the jaccuzi, just tell him: "Let's go".
- A Double Bed that provide the "Well Rested Bonus" even if it dosnt give you a msg that you received it, it show in the stats menu.
- A secret button on the jaccuzi wood post will open a secret area with a Mannequin and a chest that contains a special staff (this staff was design for followers ONLY. Read the note inside the chest to know what it does.
- A Unique Staff (Unique Mesh & Effect) is sitting next to the drying armor dummy.
- A Book that allow to craft a Unique Amulet (found on the desk).
- A fireplace so you can sit and watch the fire late at night after adventuring.
- Small workdesk area.
- Access to the Roof balcony.
- A toilet behing the bed (no new interaction beside been able to sit on it).
- An Erotic book lying on one of the night table.
- 1 mannequin.
- 3 weapon plaques.

[b][size=3]Guest Room:[/size][/b]
An other bedroom for your compagnions
Features:
- Double Bed.
- Fireplace.
- Workdesk.
- Jacuzzi (4 place to sit inside) This one is the same as the one in the master bedroom, less the fact that you cannot ask follower to sit in this one).
- A female follower skilled in magic

[b][size=3]Vault:[/size][/b]
A Room with Chest for everything categorized...
Features:
- 14 Mannequins to display your hottest armors.
- 21 weapon plaques to display your coolest weapons.
- Several Chest to easyly store all your "Precious"...
- A Secret button on the statue will open a secret passage that lead to an EXIT.

[b][size=3]Additional Features:[/size][/b]
Mount
- A Horse with a Unique Horse Armor (found in the Stable inside forge room) Mount it & Fast Travel.

For the ppl having trouble to read the enchantment on the two item with lots of enchantment:

[img]http://i1066.photobucket.com/albums/u408/sugarbabe9111/RDTLog0install.png[/img]
>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>MANUAL INSTALLATION REQUIRED<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<
1. Extract the files of this mod to a temporary location (you can use 7zip: http://www.7-zip.org, to unzip them) and look at the folder structure.
2. Copy to (install folder)\Skyrim\Data\:
.- the Meshes folder or the BSA
.- the Textures folder or the BSA
.- the Sound folder or the BSA
.- the Script folder or the BSA
.- the .esp if there is one in the mod.
If asked if you want to overwrite existing files say "Yes to all".
<<<LOAD ORDER>>>
3. I recommend loading The Dark Tower early in your load order.

>>> IMPORTANT NOTE <<<
There is a bug with skyrim where after installing a scripted mod you must save opon loading the game and reload the save to force the scripts to start running...

Upgrading from v1.1 to v2
- Get all your stuff out of the tower and create a new save
- Uncheck the mod, Delete the .esp & .bsa (and the other files that was in 1.1)
- Load the save you made above and save over it
- Inslall the new version, check the mod and load the save above

>>> IMPORTANT NOTE <<<
There is a bug with skyrim where after installing a scripted mod you must save opon loading the game and reload the save to force the scripts to start running...

[img]http://i1066.photobucket.com/albums/u408/sugarbabe9111/RDTLog0Uninstall.png[/img]
1. Delete:
.- the folder \Meshes\ that you have previously installed, or the .BSA
.- the folder \Textures\ that you have previously installed, or the .BSA
.- the folder \Script\ that you have previously installed, or the .BSA
.- the folder \Sound\ that you have previously installed, or the .BSA
.- the .esp if there is one in the mod.

Some reported that it will not work with many "house" mod... but other reported that they work with the same "house" mod together... ??? What can i say !

[img]http://i1066.photobucket.com/albums/u408/sugarbabe9111/RDTLogoKnownIssues.png[/img]
- There's a bug in vanilla that make the mannequins move when you enter a cell, if the mannequins are not to the correct position, exit the cell and reenter will fix it !
- The dread armor (lichking female) doesn't have a weight slider.
- The dread sorceress robe doesn't have a weight slider.
- Some of the gauntlets are clipping a lil.
- It's possible that after sending your dogs home that they just wander around, let them be they will eventually respawn at the forge and be ready to follow you again.
- Some ppl reported the exterior tower not showing 100% of the time, that is cause by an issue with any new added LOD mesh to the game... Bethesda has not look into this yet ! For now the mesh is set to "Full LOD", nothing more i can do at the momment !
- There's an invisible colision geometry outside the tower (unless you are using a flying mod this will not effect your game play). It's possible to correctly land on the tower roof whitout any issue.

If you find any please let me know via PM. (if your report in a post, i may not see it)
